docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Stuff
docs.text:
Setting up the footer - Material for MkDocs

Setting up navigation - Material for MkDocs

docs.title: Plain code block
docs.text:
pipx install uv
mkdir explore-mkdocs-material
cd explore-mkdocs-material
uv venv

docs.title: BASH code block
docs.text:
pipx install uv
mkdir explore-mkdocs-material
cd explore-mkdocs-material/
uv venv
. .venv/bin/activate
uv pip install mkdocs-material
uv pip freeze | uv pip compile - -o requirements.txt
code .
mkdocs new .
mkdocs serve

Note: Also exploring uv.

docs.title: Python code block
docs.text:
#!/usr/bin/env python3

#  This script will self-destruct.

from pathlib import Path

Path(__file__).unlink()

docs.title: With title, line numbers, and highlighting
docs.text:
self_destruct.py
#!/usr/bin/env python3

#  This script will self-destruct.

from pathlib import Path

Path(__file__).unlink()
